notes: It's part of the [[Within the Tides Quest]].
sounds: Harmony is just a vain illusion!
I'm ashamed of my former self!
name: Timira the Many-Headed
behaviour: Timira fights in close range, but her AoE and chain attacks will often affect other players in the room.
strategy:
The final part of the fight against Timira is quite simple. If fighting with a lower level team, the blocker can trap Timira at the north-west corner of the room so it won't switch to the shooters.

Most elements work well on Timira, although Sorcerers should avoid their waves as they'll do more damage by simply using [[Sudden Death Rune]]s. 

For the strategies of the initial stages of the fight, see [[Within the Tides Quest]].
